metadata.name: Guardian
metadata.description:
This picture is a tribute to all the hands, arms, legs, heart and love of a guardian.
The guardian with whom we can fall in love without any fear. 
The fear or betrayal, 
The fear of getting hurt,
The fear of ignorance, 
The fear of lost,
The fear of being broken,
The fear of drowning,
The fear of dark,
The fear of loneliness.
This guardian is called a "Father".

Body : Nikon D850
Lens : Nikon 70-200 F/2.8 Vr2
Dimension : 4414*6023
